Index » Bundle

Class: Bundle

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Bundle\Bundle.coffee

Overview

Bundle is the root for all bundles It contains :

  • helpers
  • convention named directories
  • boot & shutdown process

Author:

  • Jessym Reziga jessym@konsserto.com

Direct Known Subclasses

FrameworkBundle TwigBundle

Variables Summary

CONTROLLER_DIR = 
'Controller'

Controller's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

RESOURCES_DIR = 
'Resources'

Resources' directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

'Entity'

Entity's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

COMMAND_DIR = 
'Command'

Command's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

MIDDLEWARE_DIR = 
'Middleware'

Middleware's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

Instance Method Details

# (Boolean) isVendorBundle()

Returns:

  • ( Boolean ) — return true if the bundle is registered in node_modules, else false

# (String) getName()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The name of the bundle

# (String) getDir()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The directory path of the bundle

# (String) getDirSrc()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The directory path (normalized) of the bundle

# (String) getNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The namespace concerned by the bundle

# (String) getControllerNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The controller path concerned by the namespace of the bundle

# (String) getMiddlewareNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The middleware path concerned by the namespace of the bundle

# (String) getEntityNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The entity path concerned by the namespace of the bundle

# (String) getRepositoryNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The repository path concerned by the namespace of the bundle

# (String) getConfigNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The configuration path concerned by the namespace of the bundle

# (String) getTranslationsNamespace()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The translation path concerned by the namespace of the bundle

# (String) getPath(root = (process.cwd() + '/'))

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is process.cwd()

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The path of the bundle (with the source directory)

# (String) getEntityPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The entity path from the source directory

# (String) getRepositoryPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The repository path from the source directory

# (String) getResourcesPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The resources path from the source directory

# (String) getConfigPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The configurations path from the source directory

# (String) getTranslationsPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The translation path from the source directory

# (String) getPublicPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The public path from the source directory

# (String) getCommandPath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The command path from the source directory

# (String) getMiddlewarePath(root = null)

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — Root directory, default is null

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The middleware path from the source directory

# (Controller) fetchController(name, get = false)

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the controller to fetch
  • get ( Boolean ) — Is the controller already loaded ?

Returns:

  • ( Controller ) — The fetched controller

# (Middleware) fetchMiddleware(name, get = false)

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the middleware to fetch
  • get ( Boolean ) — Is the middleware already loaded ?

Returns:

  • ( Middleware ) — The fetched middleware

# (Middleware) fetchEntity(name, fullnameOnly = false)

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the entity to fetch
  • fullnameOnly ( Boolean ) — If the name fullNameOnly ?

Returns:

  • ( Middleware ) — The fetched entity

# (void) boot()

Log the bundle booting

# (void) shutdown()

Log the bundle shutdown

Parameters:

  • container ( ServiceContainer ) — The unique instance of the ServiceContainer

# (void) registerCommands(application)

Registers the commands of the bundle

Parameters:

  • container ( ServiceContainer ) — The unique instance of the Application
